game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the realm of Eridoria is on the brink of collapse. A powerful artifact known as the Celestial Sphere has been shattered, unleashing dark forces that threaten to destroy the land. Players take on the role of an apprentice mage who must master ancient magical abilities and form alliances with other factions to reclaim the sphere and save the realm.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Willowhaven, where players are introduced to their mentor, a renowned mage named Eryndor. Eryndor tasks the player with retrieving a series of ancient artifacts needed to repair the Celestial Sphere. The player's journey takes them across diverse landscapes and regions of Eridoria, encountering various factions and characters who will aid or hinder their progress.
game.ending: The final battle takes place at the shattered remains of the Celestial Tower, where the player must face off against the dark force's leader: a powerful sorcerer known as Malakar. If successful, the player is able to reassemble the Celestial Sphere and restore balance to the realm, becoming a legendary hero in the process.
